author: Sarah K.Kelley

review: I wasn't going to buy the Fire TV as I already have a Roku 3 and am happy with it, but then I saw the deal with SlingTV and handed over the money. I'm surprised at how much I like this device. Boot time is fast, the UI is clean, simple, and easy to use, and the voice search is fabulous. The remote control works great.What I don't like is that sometimes a second or so after a video starts the screen goes blank but I can still hear the audio. I am using an HDMI monitor I normally use with my PC (no TV in the house), and I don't know if it's the cable or the Fire TV device that causes the blank screen. I know I never have the problem when the monitor is connected to the pc, so I don't think it's the monitor.  The only way I've found to fix it is to reboot the Fire TV.  Usually this happens no more than once per active session.Overall I'm happy with the device and am finding I watch more Prime content with the Fire TV than I was via web browser.

review: Love the device - fast and sleek. Would like a means to restart the device from remote somewhere in the system settings or an app to do so. Searched the help/support to submit feature requests but could not find it, hence in the 'review'.Update:Tip from Amazon.com: You can also restart your Amazon Fire TV with your Amazon Fire TV Voice Remote or Amazon Fire TV Remote. Press and hold the Select button and the Play button at the same time until the Amazon Fire TV restarts (about five seconds).
